name: The Cambridge Hotel & Backpackers
description:
The Cambridge Hotel & Backpackers is a newly restored heritage building. It is immensely popular for its value accommodation in the capital city. The fantastic central location and carefully restored decor, combined with hard-to-match prices, has made The Cambridge Hotel the first choice for many travelers and returning guests.

Accommodation options to suit you & your budget.

The backpackers section of the hotel sets a new standard in backpacker accommodation and enables guests to backpack in style. The boutique experience has amazed guests with its luxury feel. There are 52 dorm beds, ranging from 4-8 bedded dorms, all equipped with linen and heating. 

The hotel reception is operated between 8am - 10pm, Sunday to Thursday, and 24 hours on Friday and Saturday. 
Please note that due to circumstances beyond our control, 24 hour reception may not always be available on weekends. 
Contact the hotel for more information. 

Please note that the actual layout, furnishings and condition of your room may differ from the photos. All other amenities listed will be available. 

No smoking on site

Check in is available from 2pm

R18 Venue

Saturday Nights from 9pm to 3am Sunday Morning the downstairs Cambridge Hotel Bar and Cambridge Terrace are both very busy and noisy.  
There is LOUDER than normal noise from the bar and from the street.  We apologise in advance for this, and do not recommend the rooms if you are a light sleeper, or require a good night sleep.

Please note that the actual layout, furnishings and condition of your room may differ from the photos. All other amenities listed will be available. 

Please note that an additional 1.8% of the total payment is applied charged if payment is made with a credit card. 

$20 charge applies if room key card is lost.
